NewsArticle.Title: Missing Greaves
NewsArticle.Content:
<I>To Aislings,
If you haven't noticed, certain greaves have been disappearing in Temuair. Intially it was thought that thieves were responsible, but after much research I believe some sort of magic was used. Do not worry, your greaves will be returned to you in a couple days. I will investigate further.
Eduardo<I/>
